name: ecoconnect-project
description: EcoConnect is a comprehensive platform committed to fostering sustainable living practices and building a network of environmentally conscious individuals, communities, and businesses. The mission is to empower and inspire people to adopt eco-friendly habits, support green initiatives, and engage in activities that contribute to environmental conservation. By providing resources, tools, and a vibrant community, EcoConnect aims to make sustainable living accessible and actionable for everyone, driving collective efforts towards a healthier planet.
